snippet: American Indian tribes had challenged the government’s handling of funds and natural resources held in trust.
abstract: Federal government announces that it has ended dozens of lawsuits by agreeing to pay American Indian tribes more than $1 billion for the Interior Department's mismanagement of funds and natural resources that the government holds in trust; deal is one of the largest financial settlements made to tribes.
lead_paragraph: American Indian tribes had challenged the government’s handling of funds and natural resources held in trust.

headline.seo: U.S. to Pay $1 Billion Settlement to Indian Tribes
headline.main: U.S. Will Pay a Settlement of $1 Billion to 41 Tribes
headline.print_headline: U.S. Will Pay A Settlement Of $1 Billion To 41 Tribes
